text:
e="preserve">Chowdhury Kamal Ibne Yusuf (1940 – 9 December 2020) was a Bangladeshi politician. He was a leader of Bangladesh Nationalist Party. From 2001 to 2004, he was Minister of Disaster Management and Relief. From 2004 to 2006, he was Minister of Food.
Yusuf died of COVID-19 at a Dhaka hospital on 9 December 2020, aged 80.

annotations.surface_form: Minister of Disaster Management and Relief
